course_description: The Graduate Internship Experience course allows students to receive course credit for participation in and completion of an unpaid internship wherein students gain training and/or workplace experience that broadens their knowledge base and skillset and expands their career options.
sections: Class Nbr: 3134, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: M. Suh, Status: Open
